page.title: 08Inside a N.Duffield house
page.content: In a village house you will walk through the door and hang up your outdoor coat on a peg.When you walk into the living room you will see a television screen showing pictures for entertainment and a sofa and arm chairs for sitting on.In the kitchen where food is prepared there will be a cooker or a microwave oven for cooking meals.There will be a pantry to keep your food in, and a table and chairs.Under the stairs you will usually find a vacuum cleaner to help you clean up around the house and a washing machine to help you clean clothes.There will be a fridge and freezer where you can keep food for a long time.When you go upstairs there will be bedrooms,with beds to sleep in and wardrobes to store clothes in.Also upstairs there is a bathroom with bath, wash basin,toilet and shower.
